headline: Why Aptiv PLC (APTV) is a Top Growth Stock for the Long-Term
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.

headline: Aptiv Is Breaking Up—and Investors Should Buy the Stock
summary: Shares have sunk because it is perceived as an auto-parts supplier, but the planned Aptiv spinoffs have growth potential.
